casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Connie Prentice REAVES. No. 225P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Narcisa Woods, Raleigh, Attorney at Law. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Reaves, Connie Prentice. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Reaves, Connie Prentice. Connie Prentice Reaves, Ms., for Reaves, Connie Prentice. Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of July 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
